tog-hideminor: Make dem hide small edits from recent changes
tog-hidepatrolled: Make dem hide patrolled edits from recent changes
tog-newpageshidepatrolled: Make dem hide patrolled pages from fresh page list
tog-extendwatchlist: Make dem expand watchlist so say e go show all changes, not just de most recent per
tog-usenewrc: Group changes by page for recent changes inside den watchlist
tog-editondblclick: Make you edit pages for double click top
tog-editsectiononrightclick: Make you enable section editing by clicking right for section titles top
tog-watchcreations: Make you add pages I create den files I upload for my watchlist
tog-watchdefault: Make you add pages den files I edit for my watchlist
tog-watchmoves: Make you add pages den files I move for my watchlist
tog-watchdeletion: Make you add pages den files I delete for my watchlist
tog-watchuploads: Make you add fresh files I upload for my watchlist
tog-watchrollback: Make you add pages where I perform rollback for my watchlist
tog-minordefault: Make you mark all edits minor by default
tog-previewontop: Make you show preview before edit box
tog-previewonfirst: Make you show preview for first edit top
tog-enotifwatchlistpages: Make you email me wen dem change page or file for my watchlist top
tog-enotifusertalkpages: Make you email me wen dem change my user talk page
tog-enotifminoredits: Make you san email me for minor edits for pages den files
tog-enotifrevealaddr: Make you reveal my email address for notification emails inside
tog-shownumberswatching: Make you show de number of users wey dey watch
tog-fancysig: Make you treat signature like wikitext (automatic link for your user page for no dey)
tog-uselivepreview: Make dem show previews wey dem no go reload de page
tog-forceeditsummary: Make you prompt me wen I enter blank edit summary (or de default undo summary)
tog-watchlisthideown: Make you hide my edits from de watchlist
tog-watchlisthidebots: Make you hide bot edits from de watchlist
tog-watchlisthideminor: Make you hide minor edits from de watchlist
tog-watchlisthideliu: Make you hide users wey log in dema edits from de watchlist
tog-watchlistreloadautomatically: Make you automatically reload de watchlist weneva dem change filter (dem dey require JavaScript)
tog-watchlistunwatchlinks: Make you add direct unwatch/watch markers ({{int:Watchlist-unwatch}}/{{int:Watchlist-unwatch-undo}}) to watch pages plus changes (dem dey require JavaScript for toggle functionality)
tog-watchlisthideanons: Make you hide edits by anonymous users from de watchlist
tog-watchlisthidepatrolled: Make you hide edits wey dem patrol from de watchlist
tog-watchlisthidecategorization: Make dem hide categorization for pages
tog-ccmeonemails: Make you send me copies for emails wey I send to oda users
tog-diffonly: Make you no show page content below diffs
tog-showhiddencats: Make you show categories wey dem hide
tog-norollbackdiff: Make you no show diff after dem perform rollback
tog-useeditwarning: Make you warn me wen I lef edit page wey be unsaved changes
tog-prefershttps: Make you always use connection wey be secure while you log in
tog-showrollbackconfirmation: Make you show confirmation prompt wen dem click for rollback link top
tog-requireemail: Make you send password reset emails per wen dem provide both email address den username.
category-empty: Dis category currently no dey contain pages or media.
category-subcat-count: {{PLURAL:$2|Dis category get de following subcategory per.|Dis category get de following {{PLURAL:$1|subcategory|$1 subcategories}}, out of $2 total.}}
category-subcat-count-limited: Dis category get de following {{PLURAL:$1|subcategory|$1 subcategories}}.
category-article-count: {{PLURAL:$2|Dis category dey contain de following page per.|De following {{PLURAL:$1|page be|$1 pages be}} for dis category inside, out of $2 total.}}
category-article-count-limited: De following {{PLURAL:$1|page be|$1 pages be}} dey de current category inside.
category-file-count: {{PLURAL:$2|Dis category dey contain de following file per. {{PLURAL:$1|file be|$1 files be}} for dis category inside, out of $2 total.}}
category-file-count-limited: De following {{PLURAL:$1|file be|$1 files be}} dey de current category inside.
broken-file-category: Pages wey get broken file links
search-ignored-headings:
# 
# Headings wey dem go ignore by search.
# Changes to dis go take effect as soon as de page plus de heading be indexed.
# You fi force page reindexing so say you go dey do null edit.
# De syntax be as follows:
#   * Everything wey comot a "#" character go de end for de line be comment.
#   * Every non-blank line be de exact title to ignore, case den everything.

updatedmarker: dem update am since you visit last
printableversion-deprecated-warning: Dem no longer dey support de printable version wey fi render errors. We beg make you update your browser hin bookmarks den instead make you use de default browser print function we beg.
viewdeleted_short: View {{PLURAL:$1|one edit wey dem delete|$1 edits wey dem deleted}}
lastmodifiedat: Dem last edit dis page for $1, at $2 top.
view-pool-error:
Sorry, dem overload de servers at de moment.
Chao users dey try view dis page.
We beg make you wait small before you sanso try access dis page.

$1
generic-pool-error:
Sorry, de servers be overload for now. 
Chao users dey try view dis resource.
We beg wait small before you sanso try access dis resource.
pool-timeout: Timeout dey wait for de lock
pool-servererror: De pool counter service no be available ($1).
nospecialpagetext: You have request invalid special page. You fit find list of valid special pages for [[Special:SpecialPages|{{int:specialpages}}]].
badtitletext:
De page hin title wey you request be invalid, empty, or incorrectly inter-language wey dem link or inter-wiki title.
E fit contain one or more characters wey dem no fit use for titles inside.
viewsourcetext: You fit view den copy de source give dis page
userlogin-remembermypassword: Make you keep me log inside
createacct-benefit-heading: {{SITENAME}} people like you wey dey make am.
anoneditwarning: Warning: You no log inside. Your IP address go be publicly visible if you make any edits. If you [$1 log in] or [$2 create an account], your edits go be attributed to your username, along plus oda benefits.
blockedtext: Dem block your username or IP address. $1 wey block you. De reason e give be say $2. * Block start: $8 * Block go expire: $6 * Blockee wey e intend: $7 You fit to contact $1 or anoda [[{{MediaWiki:Grouppage-sysop}}|administrator]] so say you go discuss de block. You fit to use de "{{int:emailuser}}" feature if dem specify valid email address for your [[Special:Preferences|preferences]] inside wey dem no block you from using am. Your current IP address be $3, wey de block ID be #$5. We beg include all above details for any queries you make inside.
newarticletext: You follow link to page wey no dey exist yet. To create de page, start dey type for de box inside below (spy de [$1 help page] for more info). If you come here by mistake, click your browser hin back button.
anontalkpagetext: ---- Dis be de discussion page for anonymous user wey no create account yet, or person wey he no dey use am. We therefore for use de numerical IP address so say we go identify dem. Such IP address fit to be shared by chao users. If you be anonymous user den feel say dem direct irrelevant comments for your top, we beg [[Special:CreateAccount|create an account]] or [[Special:UserLogin|log in]] so say you go avoid future confusion plus oda anonymous users.
noarticletext: Currently no text dey dis page inside. You fit [[Special:Search/{{PAGENAME}}|search for this page title]] for oda pages inside, [{{fullurl:{{#Special:Log}}|page={{FULLPAGENAMEE}}}} search de related logs], or [{{fullurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|action=edit}} create dis page].
noarticletext-nopermission: Currently no text dey dis page inside der. You fit [[Special:Search/{{PAGENAME}}|search dis page title]] for oda pages inside, or [{{fullurl:{{#Special:Log}}|page={{FULLPAGENAMEE}}}} search de related logs], but you no get permission to create dis page.
previewnote: Kai say dis be preview per. Dem no publish your changes yet!
templatesused: {{PLURAL:$1|Template|Templates}} dem use for dis page top:
hiddencategories: Dis page be memba giv {{PLURAL:$1|a hidden category|$1 hidden categories}}:
permissionserrorstext-withaction: You no get permission to $2, for de following {{PLURAL:$1|reason|reasons}}:
recreate-moveddeleted-warn: Warning: You dey recreate page wey dem previously delete am. You fit consider say e be appropriate you go continue dey edit dis page. Dem provide for convenience de deletion den move log give dis page for here:
moveddeleted-notice:
Dis page no dey exist.
De deletion, protection, den move log giv de page wey dem provide below giv reference.
undo-failure: De edit no fit to be undone due to edits wey dey conflict intermediate.
viewpagelogs: View logs for dis page top
histlegend:
Diff selection: Mark de radio buttons for de revisions so say you go compare den hit enter or de button wey dey de bottom.
Legend: ({{int:cur}}) = difference plus latest revision, ({{int:last}}) = difference plus revision wey dey precede, {{int:minoreditletter}} = minor edit.
history-feed-description: Revision history give dis page for de wiki top
diff-multi-sameuser: ({{PLURAL:$1|One intermediate revision|$1 intermediate revisions}} by de same user wey no dey show)
diff-multi-otherusers: ({{PLURAL:$1|One intermediate revision|$1 intermediate revisions}} by {{PLURAL:$2|one oda user|$2 users}} dem no show)
searchmenu-exists: Page dey wey dem name am "[[:$1]]" for dis wiki top. {{PLURAL:$2|0=|Sanso spy de oda search results wey you find.}}
searchmenu-new: Create de page "[[:$1]]" for dis wiki inside! {{PLURAL:$2|0=|Spy also de page wey dem find plus your search.|Spy also de search results wey dem find.}}
search-result-category-size: {{PLURAL:$1|1 memba|$1 membas}} ({{PLURAL:$2|1 subcategory|$2 subcategories}}, {{PLURAL:$3|1 file|$3 files}})
search-nonefound: No results dey match de query der.
action-createaccount: make you create dis user account
recentchanges-summary: Track de most recent pages to de wiki for dis page top.
recentchanges-noresult: Changes no dey during de given period wey dey match these criteria.
recentchanges-label-plusminus: De page size change by dis number of bytes
rcnotefrom: Below {{PLURAL:$5|be de change|be de changes}} since $3, $4 (up go $1 shown).
rclistfrom: Show fresh changes wey dey start from $2, $3
rclinks: Show last $1 changes for last $2 days inside
recentchangeslinked-summary: Enter page name so say you go see changes for pages top or from dat page. (To see category members, enter {{ns:category}}:Name of category). Changes to pages for [[Special:Watchlist|your Watchlist]] top dey bold inside.
recentchangeslinked-to: Show changes to pages wey dey link de given page instead
filehist-help: Click date/time top so say you go view de file as e appear for dat time.
linkstoimage: De following {{PLURAL:$1|page uses|$1 pages use}} dis file:
linkstoimage-more:
More dan $1 {{PLURAL:$1|page uses|pages use}} dis file.
De following list dey show de {{PLURAL:$1|first page|first $1 pages}} dat dey use dis file per.
[[Special:WhatLinksHere/$2|full list]] be available.
nolinkstoimage: No pages dey use dis file der.
sharedupload-desc-here: Dis file commot from $1 wey oda projects sa dey use am. Dem show de description for [$2 file description page] top for down der.
filepage-nofile: No file dey exist plus dis name
upload-disallowed-here: You no fit overwrite dis file.
alllogstext:
Combined display for all available logs for {{SITENAME}}.
You fit to narrow down de view so say you go select log type, de username (case-sensitive), or de page affected (san so be case-sensitive).
logempty: No matching items for log inside
watchlist-details: {{PLURAL:$1|$1 page be|$1 pages be}} for your Watchlist top (plus talk pages).
wlheader-showupdated: Pages wey dem change since you visit dem last dem show for bold inside.
wlnote: Below {{PLURAL:$1|be de last change|be de last $1 changes}} for de last {{PLURAL:$2|hour|$2 hours}} inside, as for $3, $4.
enotif_reset: Make you mark all pages you visit
nocontribs: Dem no find any changes wey dey match dis criteria.
sp-contributions-toponly: Only show edits wey be latest revisions
sp-contributions-newonly: Only show edits wey be page creations
linkshere: De pages wey dey follow dey link to $2:
svg-long-desc: SVG file, nominally $1 × $2 pixels, file size: $3
metadata-help:
Dis file dey contain additional info, probably dem add am from de digital camera or scanner wey dem use to create ir digitize am.
If dem modify de file from hin original state, some details no go fully reflect de modified file.
redirect: Redirect by file, user, page, revision, or log ID
redirect-summary: Dis special page dey redirect go file (de file name wey dem give), page (revision ID or page ID wey dem give), user page (numeric user ID wey dem give), or log entry (de log ID wey dem give). Usage: [[{{#Special:Redirect}}/file/Example.jpg]], [[{{#Special:Redirect}}/page/64308]], [[{{#Special:Redirect}}/revision/328429]], [[{{#Special:Redirect}}/user/101]], or [[{{#Special:Redirect}}/logid/186]].
searchsuggest-containing: Search for pages wey dey contain
